primary_findings: Visual-Text Consistency: Strong match between images and description

Review Authenticity: Highly authentic reviews. The most positive impact came from review 2 (classified as 'genuine' with strong confidence): "Bought it for my son. Fits him brilliantly. Good quality fabric. Comfortable fabric to wear. Looks g...". Full analysis: Review 1: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.43) - Authentic customer review with specific details; Review 2: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.86) - Authentic customer review with specific details; Review 3: Classified as 'bot-like' (confidence: 0.84) - Patterns consistent with automated generation; Review 4: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.40) - Authentic customer review with specific details; Review 5: Classified as 'genuine' (confidence: 0.78) - Authentic customer review with specific details
Brand Consistency: Strong brand presence confirmed. The strongest match was image 1 with high confidence (1.00) for brand 'Jockey'

Return Feedback Analysis: Frequent return issues reported. The most negative impact came from feedback 1: 'Item not as described' (this was a strongly negative factor). Full analysis: Feedback 1: Contains negative trigger words; Feedback 2: Classified as NEGATIVE (confidence: 1.00); Feedback 3: Contains negative trigger words
